definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 44:12 cup, bowl—´[[ג]] Ge 44:12 + 2 t.; cstr. [[גְּבִיעַ]] Ge 44:2; sf. [[גְּבִיעִי]] Ge 44:2; pl. [[גְּבִיעִים]] Ex 25:34, [[גְּבִעִים]] v:Ex 25:33, v:Ex 25:33 + 4 t.; sf. [[גְּבִיעֶיהָ]] Ex 25:31 Ex 37:17; —cup (of Joseph) Ge 44:2, Ge 44:12, Ge 44:16, Ge 44:17; pl. cups (of golden candlestick in tab.) Ex 25:31, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:34, Ex 37:17, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:20, bowls Je 35:5 [[גְּבִעִים מלאים יין וכׂסוֹת]].
